comment: Professor Andersen gives almost daily quizzes on readings assigned the day before - luckily you are able to use notes! Spend time working on the assignments as she is a tough grader.

Her class is really hard to go to because we don't really do much. Her projects take a lot of work, and she gives a lot of quizzes, but most of them are open notes. She can be a tough grader, but she is really nice and willing to help you. Make sure you show up to class.
